title: Median Calculation with Python
description: In statistics, the median is a measure of central tendency that represents the middle value of a dataset. It is the value separating the higher half from the lower half of a data sample. In this challenge, you will be required to write a Python function that finds the median of a list of numbers.

meta.title: Python | Median | Statistics
meta.description: Learn how to find the median of a list of numbers using Python. This programming tutorial covers the statistical concept of median and provides a step-by-step guide to implement a custom median function.
meta.keywords: Python, Median, Statistics, Programming, Data Analysis
